description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.Dysu4F8licjEb2FY]{Vanguard Discipline}

You can use entropy to glide slightly above the ground. You can’t be tracked using the Survival skill, though magical methods of following your tracks or finding your location function normally. When you would activate a trap with a proximity trigger, you can spend 1 Resolve Point as a reaction to attempt a Stealth check with a DC equal to the Perception DC to find the trap. If you succeed, you don’t trigger the trap for 1 round. The trap becomes immune to this ability for 24 hours afterward. This ability doesn’t prevent you from triggering the trap if you remain in the area, nor does it prevent other creatures from triggering the trap.

GM must manually set the DC for the skill check.
